text: geuui baegseong-gaunde bulsinjadeul ui sujang-i malhagil ulineun geudaeleul uliwa gat-eun ingan-eulo bakk-en boji anihamyeo uli gaunde gajang bicheon han jadeul oee geudaeleul ttaleuneun eoneu nugudo boji moshayeossnola ulineun neohui jung-eseo uliboda uwolhan geos eul boji moshaess-euni ulineun neohuiga geojismaljang-ilo saeng-gaghal ppun-ila
